datafield.subfield: Myth of emptiness in the new Americna literature of place, 2014:

ECIP t.p. (Wendy Harding) data view (b. Sept. 18, 1951; ...lives near Montpellier, France and teaches at the University of Toulouse where she is Professor of English and Co-Director of the American Studies group, G.E.N.A. She obtained a PhD from the University of Connecticut and an H.D.R. from the University of Paris-Sorbonne. She has co-authored two books on contemporary American literature with Jacky Martin, A World of Difference: An Inter-Cultural Study of Toni Morrison's Novels (Greenwood, 1994) and Beyond Words: The Othering Excursion in Contemporary American Literature (Cambridge Scholars, 2007)
